title: Peanut Butter Brownie Bars Recipe Read Reviews (30) Be the first to add a review 4.5 30
directions: Prepare brownie batter according to package directions. Spread into a greased 13x9-in. baking pan. Bake at 350Â° for 20-25 minutes or until a toothpick inserted near the center comes out with moist crumbs.
Sprinkle with peanut butter cups and peanuts. Bake 4-6 minutes longer or until chocolate is melted. Cool on a wire rack.

Meanwhile, in a microwave-safe bowl, melt the chocolate chips, peanut butter and butter; stir until smooth. Stir in the cereal, vanilla and salt. Carefully spread over brownies. Cover and refrigerate for at least 2 hours before cutting. Yield: 3 dozen.
ingredients: 1 package fudge brownie mix (13-inch x 9-inch pan size)
